description: A regular government user in the system.
name: GovUser

description: A System Administrator in the application with User Management and Roles and Permissions access.
name: Admin

description: A government user with authorization to Approve Credit Transfers.
name: GovDirector

description: A Fuel Supplier user with limited abilities to take actions.
name: FSUser

description: A Fuel Supplier user with authority to act on behalf of the Fuel Supplier on Credit Transfers.
name: FSManager
